TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HealthServiceLocation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods that retrieve URLs of important locations for the HealthVault service.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl (Microsoft.Health.ShellRedirectParameters redirectParameters);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl(class Microsoft.Health.ShellRedirectParameters redirectParameters) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHealthServiceShellUrl (redirectParameters As ShellRedirectParameters) As Uri
static member GetHealthServiceShellUrl : Microsoft.Health.ShellRedirectParameters -> Uri

Docs.param: Parameters used to contruct the redirect URL.
Docs.summary: Constructs a URL to be redirected to via the HealthVault service Shell URL redirector, given the specified redirect parameters.
Docs.exception: The specified parameters construct an invalid URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl (string targetLocation);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl(string targetLocation) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHealthServiceShellUrl (targetLocation As String) As Uri
static member GetHealthServiceShellUrl : string -> Uri

Docs.param: A known constant indicating the internal HealthVault service Shell location to redirect to. See Shell redirect interface.
Docs.summary: Constructs a URL to be redirected to via the HealthVault service Shell URL redirector, given the specified location.
Docs.remarks: The is passed as the target parameter value to the redirector URL.
Docs.exception: The specific target location constructs an improper URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl (string targetLocation, string targetQuery);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri GetHealthServiceShellUrl(string targetLocation, string targetQuery) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHealthServiceShellUrl (targetLocation As String, targetQuery As String) As Uri
static member GetHealthServiceShellUrl : string * string -> Uri

Docs.param: A known constant indicating the internal HealthVault service Shell location to redirect to. See Shell redirect interface.
The query string value to pass to the URL to which redirection is taking place.
Docs.summary: Constructs a URL to be redirected to via the HealthVault service Shell URL redirector, given the specified location and query.
Docs.remarks: The is passed as the target parameter value to the redirector URL. The is URL-encoded and passed to the redirector URL as the target query string parameter value.
Docs.exception: The specific target location constructs an improper URL.
